DOC.brief_summary: This clustered randomize control trial test Tobacco Tactics intervention among Operating Engineers ( heavy equipment worker ) . The intervention group direct Tobacco Tactics website , control group direct state support 1-800 quit-now telephone hotline routine annual safety training Operating Engineers require attend . The web-based quitting intervention include provision over-the-counter nicotine replacement therapy follow nurse email and/or telephone counseling . It expect Operating Engineers randomize Tobacco Tactics website intervention least equal great decrease smoke 30-day 6-month follow-up compare randomized 1-800-QUIT-NOW quit line . In addition , investigator expect find Operating Engineers randomize Tobacco Tactics website intervention : ) able accomplish task ; b ) able accomplish goal skill speed ; c ) able operate system ; ) satisfy website ; e ) access site repeatedly ; f ) spend time site intervention period .
DOC.criteria: attend training session provide Operating Engineers Local 324 Education Center great 18 year age smoke cigarette past month interested participate program quit smoking
